mapper.select: SELECT id, worker_id, worker_name, task_id, task_name, start_time, end_time, units_assigned, is_break, status, feedback, shift_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM assignment
SELECT id, worker_id, worker_name, task_id, task_name, start_time, end_time, units_assigned, is_break, status, feedback, shift_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM assignment WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assignment(worker_id, worker_name, task_id, task_name, start_time, end_time, units_assigned, is_break, status, feedback, shift_name, shift_start, shift_end) VALUES(#{workerId}, #{workerName}, #{taskId}, #{taskName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{unitsAssigned}, #{isBreak}, #{status}, #{feedback}, #{shiftName}, #{shiftStart}, #{shiftEnd})
